q1: How do I use copied emojis?
a1: Click any emoji to copy it to your clipboard, then paste it anywhere using Ctrl+V (or Cmd+V on Mac). Works in any text field.
q2: Why do some emojis look different on different devices?
a2: Each operating system and platform has its own emoji design. The same Unicode character may look slightly different on Apple, Google, Microsoft, and Samsung devices.
a3: We include emojis from the latest Unicode standard. Older devices or browsers may not display the newest emojis correctly.
